lvcache: a tool for managing LVM caches Lars Kellogg-Stedman
http://blog.oddbit.com/post/2014-08-16-lvcache-a-tool-for-managing-lv/ 2014-08-16T00:00:00Z 2014-08-16T00:00:00Z Until recently I had a bcache based setup on my laptop, but when forced by circumstance to reinstall everything I spent some time looking for alternatives that were less disruptive to configure on an existing system. I came across Richard Jones’ article discussing the recent work to integrate dm-cache into LVM. Unlike bcache and unlike using dm-cache directly, the integration with LVM makes it easy to associate devices with an existing logical volume.
